name: tableCustomSQLQuery
description: Test if a custom SQL returns 0 row or `COUNT(<x>) == 0`

parameterDefinition.name: sqlExpression
parameterDefinition.description: SQL expression to run against the table

parameterDefinition.name: strategy
parameterDefinition.description: Strategy to use to run the custom SQL query (i.e. `SELECT COUNT(<col>)` or `SELECT <col> (defaults to ROWS)

parameterDefinition.name: operator
parameterDefinition.description: Operator to use to compare the result of the custom SQL query to the threshold.

parameterDefinition.name: threshold
parameterDefinition.description: Threshold to use to determine if the test passes or fails (defaults to 0).

parameterDefinition.name: partitionCondition
parameterDefinition.description: Partition condition that will be used to compute the passed/failed row count, if compute row count is enabled.
